item.title: Alia add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Ol' man Simon, planted a diamond. Grew hisself a garden the likes of none. Sprouts all growin' comin' up glowin' Fruit of jewels all shinin' in the sun. Colors of the rainbow. See the sun and the rain grow sapphires and rubies on ivory vines, Grapes of jade, just ripenin' in the shade, just ready for the squeezin' into green jade wine. Pure gold corn there, Blowin' in the warm air. Ol' crow nibblin' on the amnythyst seeds. In between the diamonds, Ol' man Simon crawls about pullin' out platinum weeds. Pink pearl berries, all you can carry, put 'em in a bushel and haul 'em into town. Up in the tree there's opal nuts and gold pears- Hurry quick, grab a stick and shake some down. Take a silver tater, emerald tomater, fresh plump coral melons. Hangin' in reach. Ol' man Simon, diggin' in his diamonds, stops and rests and dreams about one... real... peach." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "The road must be trod, but it will be very hard. And neither strength nor wisdom will carry us far upon it. This quest may be attempted by the weak with as much hope as the strong. Yet it is oft the course of deeds that move the wheels of the world: Small hands do them because they must, while the eyes of the great are elsewhere." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "All's well that ends better." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I do not love the bright sword for its sharpness, nor the arrow for its swiftness, nor the warrior for his glory. I love only that which they defend." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Advice is a dangerous gift, even from the wise to the wise, and all courses may run ill." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by JRR Tolkien
item.description: "End? No, the journey doesn't end here. Death is just another path, one that we all must take. The grey rain-curtain of this world rolls back, and all turns to silver glass, and then you see it." -- JRR Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Now it is a strange thing, but things that are good to have and days that are good to spend are soon told about, and not much to listen to; while things that are uncomfortable, palpitating, and even gruesome, may make a good tale, and take a deal of telling anyway." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Don't adventures ever have an end? I suppose not. Someone else always has to carry on on the story." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Your time may come. Do not be too sad, Sam. You cannot be always torn in two. You will have to be one and whole, for many years. You have so much to enjoy and to be, and to do." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I don't know half of you half as well as I should like; and I like less than half of you half as well as you deserve." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Deserves it! I daresay he does. Many that live deserve death. And some that die deserve life. Can you give it to them? Then do not be too eager to deal out death in judgement. For even the very wise cannot see all ends." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I will not say, do not weep, for not all tears are an evil." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "It's a dangerous business, Frodo, going out your door. You step onto the road, and if you don't keep your feet, there's no knowing where you might be swept off to." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "There is some good in this world, and it's worth fighting for." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Alia add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "A single dream is more powerful than a thousand realities." -- J.R.R. Tolkien
